title: The Divine Circle of Ladies Courting Trouble
description: October in New England is a grand time—great for carving pumpkins, throwing Halloween parties, baking and eating brownies, and… dropping dead? When a helmlock-laced brownie at the church hospitality hour spells the end for an elderly townswoman, Cass Shipton and her circle of fabulous friends get to work using their very special brand of detective skills to ferret out the culprit. After all, their unorthodox recipe of magic, clairvoyance, and good old-fashioned common sense hasn't let them down yet…
author: Dolores Stewart Riccio
